statements: DELETE FROM CropYieldForecasting WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND weather_condition = 'Rainy';
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND temperature > 25.0
DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30 AND precipitation < 10;
DELETE FROM crop_yield WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND year = 2020;
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND location = 'Field A';
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE weather_id = 100 AND date = '2022-05-01'
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE location = 'Field A' AND reading_value < 50
